channel.title: Censor

item.title: Censor
item.dc:creator: @Limit101 Limit101
item.description:
@Limit101 wrote:

I have this for my yell but the censor isn’t working =\

What would i do to make it work

if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “[”+playerName + “] : " + command.substring(5);
}
try {
command.replaceAll(“no-ip”, “[Censor]”);
command.replaceAll(“servegame”, “[Censor]”);
command.replaceAll(“www”, “[Censor]”);
command.replaceAll(“www.”, “[Censor]”);
command.replaceAll(”.com", “[Censor]”);
command.replaceAll(“com”, “[Censor]”);
command.trim();
}
catch(Exception e) {
}

Read full topic
